Label: Product form description (supplement)
Description: If product form codes do not adequately describe the supplement, a short text description may be added to give a more detailed specification of the product form. The field is optional, and repeatable to provide parallel descriptions in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <ProductFormDescription>, but must be included in each instance if <ProductFormDescription> is repeated to provide parallel descriptions in multiple languages.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 200 characters</dd>
